author: Xbox
description:
The award winning sci-fi/city builder is out now Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ixion/9mvmphf8nkhb

IXION is an unrelenting, city-building odyssey across the stars. As Administrator of the Tiqqun, DOLOS’ prototype space station, you are tasked with balancing preservation and exploration as you manage infrastructure, resources and crew. Can you keep the flame of humanity alight in the cold dark?


SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: IXION Console XBOX Release Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
The reviews are in! See what critics are saying about Compulsion Games' new action-adventure South of Midnight. 

Learn an ancient weaving power, explore the Deep South mythos, and confront mysterious creatures in this folktale for modern times.

Play now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series XIS, Steam, and Windows PC.

https://www.xbox.com/games/south-of-midnight

author: Xbox
description:
METAL EDEN Demo - Out Now 

HYPER UNITS - get ready to dive into the adrenaline-fueled sci-fi world of METAL EDEN. Experience the first two missions of the game, featuring high-octane combat and futuristic parkour, with the free demo, available now on Xbox.  

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/metal-eden/9pp1whrp17bk 

METAL EDEN releases May 6 2025 on Xbox.
